3. In the "Salary Tables" page, you can create a new salary table by clicking the "New Salary Table" button.
4. Enter the name of the new salary table and select the desired payroll period (e.g., monthly, bi-monthly, etc.).
5. Define the salary table structure by adding columns for the different payment components (e.g., basic salary, bonus, allowances, etc.).
6. Configure the payroll taxes and deductions for each payment component.
7. Set up the salary table formulas to calculate the total salary for each employee based on their individual payment components.
8. Save and activate the new salary table.
9. Update the salary table in the employee's personnel file by clicking the "Update" button next to the salary field.
10. The updated salary table will be reflected in the employee's payroll records and will be used for future payments.

In rexx HR, FTE stands for Full-Time Equivalent. It refers to the number of full-time employees that are equivalent to the number of part-time or temporary employees in a particular period. In other words, it's a way to convert the number of part-time or temporary workers into a full-time equivalent workforce.

For example, if an organization has 10 part-time employees working 20 hours per week each, and they want to know the FTE equivalent of that workforce, they can multiply the total hours worked by those part-time employees by the number of weeks in a year (52) to get the FTE equivalent.

In rexx HR, FTE is used to calculate various HR metrics such as headcount, employee turnover rates, and productivity measures. It's an important concept in HR analytics and workforce planning, as it allows organizations to compare their full-time and part-time workforces on a level playing field.

In Rexx HR Software, the combination of profiles is done by taking the values from each profile and combining them using a logical AND operation. This means that if a user has multiple profiles with conflicting values, the final value will be the one that is specified in the last profile.

For example, let's say a user has two profiles: Profile A and Profile B. Profile A has the rights "Right X" set to "Yes", while Profile B has the right "Right Y" set to "No". If the user has both profiles combined, the final value for Right Y will be "No", because the last profile (Profile B) overrides the earlier one (Profile A).

It's important to note that the combination of profiles is done in a hierarchical manner. This means that if a user has multiple roles with different levels of authorization, the final set of rights and permissions will reflect the highest level of authorization.

results.question: Wie funktionieren Vorlagen in rexx HR?
results.expected_answer: Vorlagen ermöglichen die Standardisierung von Dokumenten und Prozessen im System.
results.generated_answer:
In rexx HR, the new "Dokument" workflow type introduces a flexible and modular approach to creating documents. Unlike the previous "Arbeitszeugnis" module, which was limited to creating works certificates, the "Dokument" workflow allows for the creation of any type of document.

To create a document using the "Dokument" workflow, you can use pre-defined text building blocks (called "Textbausteine") and form templates (called "Formschreiben"). The Textbausteine are flexible content elements that can be used to create different types of documents, while the Formschreiben provide a framework for organizing the document's structure.

The system recognizes the Textbausteine within a Formschreiben based on placeholder markers, and makes them available for use in the workflow process. You can also add directly written text within the Formschreiben, which can be adapted later in the workflow process if needed.

To use Vorlagen (templates) in rexx HR, you can create a new Formschreiben based on an existing template. Once the new Formschreiben is created, you can fill it with the appropriate Textbausteine to create the desired document. The system will recognize the Placeholder markers and make the corresponding Textbausteine available for use in the workflow process.

results.question: Was sind Typen-Administration?
results.expected_answer: Die Typen-Administration ermöglicht die Konfiguration verschiedener Kategorien und Typen für Systemdaten.
results.generated_answer:
Das rexx Empfehlungsmanagement ist ein Instrument zur Bewerberfindung, das auf Empfehlungen von Mitarbeitern basiert. Es gibt zwei Varianten des Empfehlungsmanagements, die von der rexx Software angeboten werden:

1. Klassisches Empfehlungsmanagement: Dieses ist einsetzbar, wenn die rexx Suite (rexx ER und rexx HR) genutzt wird. Hierbei können Mitarbeiter durch das Einreichen von Empfehlungen für Bewerber eine Beteiligung am Recruiting-Prozess haben.
2. Talentbringer: Diese Variante des Empfehlungsmanagements ist speziell für das rexx ER Stand-Alone (ohne rexx HR) entwickelt worden. Hierbei können Mitarbeiter durch das Einreichen von Empfehlungen für Bewerber Talente für das Unternehmen identifizieren und empfehlen.

In both cases, the rexx software supports the integration of employee recommendations into the recruiting process, which can lead to a higher success rate and lower costs compared to traditional, non-digital programs. By using the rexx Empfehlungsmanagement and the rexx Bewerbermanagement Software together, data can be easily transferred between the two systems, allowing for a more efficient and effective recruiting process.

results.question: Wie funktioniert das Personal/User Setup?
results.expected_answer: Das Personal/User Setup ermöglicht die Konfiguration von Benutzerkonten und Personalstammdaten im System.
results.generated_answer:
Das Personal/User Setup ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil von rexx HR Software, um die Benutzerdaten für den Erstdatenimport zu konfigurieren. Das Personal/User Setup ermöglicht es, bestimmte Felder in der Importdatei automatisch zu befüllen. Hier sind die Schritte, um das Personal/User Setup anzulegen:

1. Öffnen Sie das Top-Level-Menü und klicken Sie auf "Personal/User Setup".
2. Klicken Sie auf "Neues Personal/User Setup anlegen".
3. Im Feldbereich "Workflows" können Sie die Berechtigungsprofile für die Benutzer anpassen. Hier können Sie auch das Standard-Mail-Schema und den Telefon Workflow festlegen.
4. Im Bereich "Arbeitszeiten" können Sie die Arbeitszeiten des Benutzers anpassen, während im Bereich "Urlaubsansprüche" die Urlaubsgrundlagen festgelegt werden können.
5. In der Gruppe "Feiertagsgruppen" können Sie die Feiertage des Benutzers anpassen.
6. Wenn Sie neue Felder hinzufügen möchten, können Sie das Feld "Zusatzfelder" anklicken und weitere Felder hinzufügen.
